business.headline: Dr Reddy's asks several top-paid executives to quit in cost-cutting drive: ReportDr Reddy's Laboratories (DRL) FY24 annual report shows it had over 26,000 employees worldwide as of March 2024. That includes 21,757 permanent staff. In FY24, the company hired 6,281 people and spent Rs 5,030 crore on employee benefits,

Over 40? You might be first in line for layoff, says Bombay Shaving Company CEOProfessionals in their 40s, once seen as reliable, experienced and ready for leadership roles, are now being hit hard by layoffs.

Tycoons in turmoil: Indian billionaires caught in Trump's tariff stormThe net worth of Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Shiv Nadar, and others has taken a massive hit amid a sharp correction in equity markets, fuelled by foreign investor exits and escalating global trade friction. All thanks to US President Donald Trump's tariff shock.

Rs 2.25 crore lumpsum or Rs 84k monthly? Which pension plan should you opt forUnder UPS, the government puts in 10% of your basic salary and dearness allowance and adds another 8.5% to your pension pot. On the other hand, under NPS, the government contributes 14% of your salary.

BluSmart likely to end cab service, join hands with Uber: ReportThe company, which started out by operating electric vehicles on Uber's platform nearly six years ago, is now preparing to shut down its own cab service and supply cars to Uber again.

Investing or borrowing? Check new SBI, HDFC, BOI interest ratesThe latest rate cut signals a broader trend—savers are using savings accounts mainly for transactions, while putting the rest in fixed deposits for better returns.

Mehul Choksi arrested in Belgium: What is the Rs 14,000-crore PNB scam?Mehul Choksi once headed the Gitanjali Group, a well-known jewellery firm. Born in 1959, Choksi was active in the diamond industry for many years.

Bank of India cuts home loan rates for new, existing customers. Check detailsThis adjustment is expected to make borrowing slightly easier for individuals at a time when the RBI is clearly looking to revive private investment and sustain domestic demand.

What to expect from stock market this week? 4 key things investors should knowMultiple factors could determine the mood on Dalal Street. From April 12 to 19, investors will be watching crucial Q4 earnings, economic data releases in India, the US, and China.
Investor visits Mumbai slum, uncovers truth about 'Make in India'Veteran investor Shankar Sharma recently shared a personal experience that raised fresh questions about India's manufacturing reality.

'Shift to UAE': Kotak AMC MD Nilesh Shah flags tax loophole exploited by NRIsNilesh Shah has warned that high-net-worth individuals could exploit tax treaties with some countries to avoid India's capital gains tax.

RBI may pay record Rs 2.5 lakh crore dividend to centre in FY25The RBI is likely to announce the exact dividend amount in late May. Last year, the payout surprised many as it was double what most had expected.

entertainment.headline: Akshay Kumar thanks PM for honouring Sankaran Nair: Kesari Chapter 2 is a reminderAkshay Kumar has reacted to Prime Minister Narendra Modi's praise for Sir C Sankaran Nair and his bold stand against British rule following the Jallianwala Bagh massacre. He thanked the PM for remembering Nair and acknowledging his contribution to India's freedom struggle.

Tu Mera Lover: Ravi Teja, Sreeleela dazzle together in Mass Jathara's first singleRavi Teja and Sreeleela dazzle in 'Tu Mera Lover', a high-energy track from 'Mass Jathara' that blends nostalgia, AI vocals, and mass appeal setting the stage for a box office storm.

Ajith's fans break into fight during Good Bad Ugly screening in KeralaAt a screening of Ajith-starrer 'Good Bad Ugly' in Kerala, the movie theatre became an ugly battleground. A brawl broke out between Vijay and Ajith Kumar's fans.

Jack Black's A Minecraft Movie surpasses $550M globally, breaks records'A Minecraft Movie', a video game adaptation is the highest-grossing film of 2025 so far. Jason Momoa and Jack Black are capturing audiences globally, causing fan frenzy at the theatres.

Sabrina Carpenter celebrates one year of Espresso, sells out special edition vinylsSabrina Carpenter launched a special 'coffee-filled' vinyl editions to celebrate one year of the pop hit 'Espresso', and fans can't get enough of it.

Here's what Katy Perry is carrying with her to spaceSinger Katy Perry is one of six women set to travel to space as part of the first all-women space crew. Ahead of the spaceflight, the singer shared a special message for her family and revealed things she is carrying along with her.

Madharasi: Sivakarthikeyan, Murugadoss's film locked for September releaseSivakarthikeyan and director AR Murugadoss's 'Madharasi' is eyeing a September 2025 release. The release date was announced on April 14, along with a brand-new poster.

Jewel Thief trailer: Saif Ali Khan, Jaideep plot perfect steal in heist thrillerNetflix has released the trailer for 'Jewel Thief – The Heist Begins', an action-packed thriller debuting on April 25. The film features a star-studded cast led by Saif Ali Khan and Jaideep Ahlawat.

Suits LA Episode 8 review: Harvey Spector is here to rule power game with Ted BlackHarvey Spector has landed on the West Coast carrying the same style and power that he exuded in the original 'Suits'. The catch here is that he's going to join forces with LA's very own best entertainment lawyer - Ted Black - for an ultimate finale in New York.

Good Bad Ugly director talks success with Ajith, shares key advice from Tamil starAjith Kumar's latest film, 'Good Bad Ugly', has become a massive success, with celebrations held in Hyderabad to mark its blockbuster status. Director Adhik Ravichandran praised Ajith for his humility and shared how the actor advised him to stay grounded despite the film's success.

Coachella cuts Megan Thee Stallion's mic during climax of star-studded setMegan Thee Stallion's Coachella set ended abruptly when her mic was cut during the climax, silencing her performance of "Mamushi" despite visuals playing. Fans were left confused and disappointed, but Megan powered through, showing grace amid the technical glitch.

Sunny Singh on The Bhootnii comparisons with Stree: Same world, different storyActor Sunny Singh reacted to the comparisons between 'The Bhootnii' and 'Stree'. He said that the 'world is same, the stories are different.'

People feel threatened: Randeep Hooda after Bollywood ignored his role in ExtractionBollywood actor Randeep Hooda opened up about the lack of appreciation from the Hindi film industry for his role in the Hollywood film 'Extraction'. Despite his substantial screen time alongside Chris Hemsworth, Hooda's work was largely ignored by Bollywood, but he found recognition among South Indian filmmakers.

Kesari 2: Akshay Kumar, R Madhavan visit Golden Temple ahead of film's releaseThe cast of Kesari 2, including Akshay Kumar, Ananya Panday, and R Madhavan, visited the Golden Temple in Amritsar for blessings ahead of the film's release. The movie, based on true events, explored the aftermath of the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

Suniel Shetty's note about granddaughter, slow living, and real joy melts heartsActor Suniel Shetty said he has found real joy in his granddaughter. He wrote a long note about how the feeling of carrying his granddaughter in his arms is unparalleled and has provided new meaning to his life.
Veteran Kannada actor Bank Janardhan dies at 75Kannada film and television actor Bank Janardhan died at the age of 75 due to age-related health issues.

Fear patriarchy, not paranormal: Nushrratt Bharuccha's Chhorii 2 is a wake-up callNushrratt Bharuccha's 'Chhorii 2' highlights the brutal side of Indian society, where the preference for having a male child and the growing cases of female foeticide have added to the ongoing debates about deep-rooted patriarchy, gender-based violence, and the societal failure to value the girl child.

Who is Kerianne Flynn, producer travelling with Katy Perry to space?Producer Kerianne Flynn, who has bankrolled several acclaimed projects, including 'The Automatic Hate' (2015), 'This Changes Everything', and more, is among the six women preparing to launch into space on a Blue Origin rocket.

Randeep Hooda questions Ranbir's role in Highway promotions while he was left outRanbir Kapoor once promoted 'Highway' with Alia Bhatt and Imtiaz Ali, while the film's lead actor, Randeep Hooda, was kept out of promotions. Now, the latter asked what Ranbir had to do with the film.

general news.headline: 8 cops injured, police van vandalised in fresh Waqf protest violence in BengalViolence erupted in West Bengal's South 24 Paraganas as Indian Secular Front supporters clashed with police during an anti-Waqf Act protest, injuring eight officers and damaging vehicles.

Letters from hundreds of Muslim widows triggered waqf reforms, says PM ModiPrime Minister Narendra Modi said the Centre took up the task of reforming the management of waqf properties after receiving letters from hundreds of Muslim widows. Had waqf assets been managed properly, young Muslim men wouldn't have been forced to make a living by repairing "bicycle punctures", he added.

Katy Perry rockets into space on century's first all-women flightKaty Perry was joined on the flight by five other women, Lauren Sanchez, fiance of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, journalist Gayle King, film producer Kerianne Flynn, civil rights activist Amanda Nguyen, and former Nasa engineer Aisha Bowe.

Family ties, fugitive fortunes: Inside Mehul Choksi's inner circle role in PNB scamFugitive diamond merchant Mehul Choksi, once a glittering name in India's jewellery industry, was involved in a well-oiled family apparatus that helped him move massive sums across borders and hide illicit wealth through offshore firms and shell companies.

Not just the planet: The climate crisis is also affecting our mindsWhile not officially classified as a mental illness, eco-anxiety manifests through symptoms such as helplessness, guilt, and distress. This form of anxiety is particularly prevalent among younger generations who are deeply concerned about the world they will inherit.

LSG vs CSK live: Onus on Pant after Badoni departsIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK Live Score: Ravindra Jadeja has broken the partnership after dismissing Mitchell Marsh. Ayush Badoni has joined his captain Rishabh Pant in the middle.

Axe falls on Nasa's Indian-origin DEI chief after attempt to hide her failsEver since 900 NASA employees were laid off, the space agency had tried to shield its DEI chief Neela Rajendra by rebranding her role and removing all DEI references from her profile. But the move did not outlast Donald Trump's sweeping orders to do away with programmes on diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI).
Katy Perry sang 'what a wonderful world' after seeing Earth from spaceGayle King, a fellow crew member, recalled the moment fondly, noting that Perry's singing was a highlight of their journey.

BR Ambedkar's untold stories: How a boy, denied water, wrote India's ConstitutionDr BR Ambedkar was once refused water because of caste. But India's most powerful reformer turned pain into purpose and went on to draft the law of the land. These are the stories in between.

AIADMK on board, why BJP must now play NDA glue in Tamil NaduExpect some post-reunion teething troubles since the BJP's growth in the poll-bound state in the past few years has been at the cost of the AIADMK

Vanishing Daughters Part 4: Testimonies of women who have seen it allIllegal sex determination and unsafe abortions continue to plague Haryana, claiming lives and exposing systemic legal failures, while women bear the brunt of this gender-biased crisis.

Mehul Choksi's extradition requested, Indian officials to travel to BelgiumThe Belgian authorities are preparing for further legal proceedings that Choksi will be facing, while legal counsel will be provided for him as well.

Tycoons in turmoil: Indian billionaires caught in Trump's tariff stormThe net worth of Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Shiv Nadar, and others has taken a massive hit amid a sharp correction in equity markets, fuelled by foreign investor exits and escalating global trade friction. All thanks to US President Donald Trump's tariff shock.

Centre might take fight back to SC as ruling curtails President's powerThe Centre is likely to file a petition in the Supreme Court, seeking a review of the apex court's ruling in the Tamil Nadu case. The landmark judgment, which set a deadline for the Executive to clear Bills, also curtailed the President's absolute veto powers.

Punjab-born surgeon killed in US chopper crash; husband was the pilotPunjab-born surgeon Joy Saini and five of her family were killed in a plane crash in New York. The aircraft was piloted by her husband, Michael Groff, and crashed just 16km short of its destination. Saini had moved to the US as a child with her parents.

Woman stripped off hijab, Hindu man beaten in UP's Muzaffarnagar; 6 arrestedThe men in the video are seen forcibly removing the woman's hijab, while verbally abusing, harassing, and physically assaulting her and the man who accompanied her.

UP men accused of manhandling woman seen limping post-arrest: 'Oscar-worthy act'A group of six men were accused of stripping off a woman's hijab and assaulting a Hindu man accompanying her in Uttar Pradesh's Muzaffarnagar.

Trump tariffs: How India can turn crisis into opportunityIndia should seize the 90-day pause to explore how it can take advantage of realigned trade rules and emerging technologies to reinvent its economic trajectory

Rare diamond, once owned by maharajas, set for auction, to fetch over Rs 300 croreThe Golconda Blue, once owned by the Maharajas of Indore and Baroda, is set to be auctioned at Christie's 'Magnificent Jewels' auction in Geneva on May 14.

Trump's new immigration rules bring more bad news for IndiansThe EB-5 Unreserved category for Indian applicants has retrogressed by over six months - from November 1, 2019, to May 1, 2019 - narrowing the eligibility window and significantly delaying the path to US permanent residency.

Porter agent calls customer lazy for tower-to-tower delivery, video sparks debateThe Porter delivery man, who documented the process in the video, turned the camera toward tower 17, from where he had to collect the order, and then pointed at tower 19 in the same apartment complex, where it needed to be delivered.

How India foiled Mehul Choksi's plan to flee to SwitzerlandMehul Choksi, who fled India in 2018 before his involvement in PNB scam case came to light, was arrested by Belgium authorities at India's request.

NCERT gives Hindi names to English textbooks, sparks language rowThe NCERT has stirred debate by giving Hindi names to its new English-medium textbooks, including those meant for learning English. Experts and educators question the move, calling it confusing and a break from long-standing academic norms.

Why Interpol dropped Mehul Choksi's Red Notice and what his arrest means for IndiaWith Mehul Choksi's detention in Belgium, the focus will now shift to the extradition process, which could take time depending on legal proceedings there. However, Indian authorities are hopeful that this arrest will lead to a breakthrough in the long-drawn case involving one of India's most high-profile fugitives.

sports.headline: Dhoni Review System is back! Fans praise CSK skipper for call to dismiss PooranFans went gaga as the Dhoni Review System made a return in the IPL 2025 during the LSG vs CSK clash as Nicholas Pooran. Dhoni took the call with a smile, and it turned out to be the right decision.

Virat Kohli's 100 T20 fifties as good as scoring 100 ODI centuries: Childhood coachVirat Kohli's childhood coach Rajkumar Sharma has said that him scoring 100 T20 fifties is as good as 100 ODI centuries. Kohli scored his 100th T20 fifty against Rajasthan Royals (RR) in Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Who is Shaik Rasheed? 20-year-old batter from Andhra makes CSK debut vs LSGShaik Rasheed becomes the latest debutant to make his bow for the Chennai Super Kings in the IPL. Here's all you need to know about the 20-year-old Andhra batter, who is a mainstay for his side in the domestic circuit.

MS Dhoni plays with IPL's new robotic camera dog in LucknowIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK: An avid animal lover, MS Dhoni was visibly charmed by the robotic dog, a cool new tech addition to the Indian Premier League. Dhoni was in the mood to have some fun as he walked up for the toss on Monday, April 14.

PBKS pacer Lockie Ferguson all but ruled out of IPL 2025: James HopesPBKS coach James Hopes has confirmed that Lockie Ferguson is out indefinitely for the season and is a doubt to make a return this campaign. Ferguson suffered the injury during the game against SRH.

CSK drop R Ashwin and Devon Conway in Lucknow, Shaik Rasheed handed debutChennai Super Kings have made two changes to their playing XI ahead of the game against Lucknow Super Giantss (LSG) as they dropped Ravichandran Ashwin from the side.

LSG vs CSK live: Onus on Pant, Badoni after Jadeja gets MarshIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK Live Score: Ravindra Jadeja has broken the partnership after dismissing Mitchell Marsh. Ayush Badoni has joined his captain Rishabh Pant in the middle.

IPL 2025: Violent clash breaks out among fans at Delhi's Arun Jaitley StadiumA violent fight broke out between two groups of fans at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi during Delhi Capitals' (DC) clash against Mumbai Indians (MI). MI beat DC by 12 runs as they successfully defended 205 runs.

Watch: Rishabh Pant in awe as Nicholas Pooran sings Hindi song flawlesslyIPL 2025: Nihcolas Pooran flaunted his singing skills as he effortlessly sang a popular Bollywood number during a karaoke night in the Lucknow Super Giants camp. Rishabh Pant and his teammates were in awe of Pooran's effort.

CSK should call Prithvi Shaw in if Ruturaj Gaikwad is out of IPL 2025: Aakash ChopraAakash Chopra feels that Chennai Super Kings should rope in Prithvi Shaw as a replacement for Ruturaj Gaikwad. The CSK skipper is ruled out of IPL 2025 due to injury.

Hair dryer award in PSL: James Vince shares cheeky Insta postPSL 2025: James Vince shared a cheeky post on social media after he got a hair dryer as an award following his heroic century for the Karachi Kings against Multan Sultans at the National Stadium.

IPL 2025: Violent clash breaks out among fans at Delhi's Arun Jaitley StadiumA violent fight broke out between two groups of fans at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi during Delhi Capitals' (DC) clash against Mumbai Indians (MI). MI beat DC by 12 runs as they successfully defended 205 runs.

Watch: Rishabh Pant in awe as Nicholas Pooran sings Hindi song flawlesslyIPL 2025: Nihcolas Pooran flaunted his singing skills as he effortlessly sang a popular Bollywood number during a karaoke night in the Lucknow Super Giants camp. Rishabh Pant and his teammates were in awe of Pooran's effort.

CSK should call Prithvi Shaw in if Ruturaj Gaikwad is out of IPL 2025: Aakash ChopraAakash Chopra feels that Chennai Super Kings should rope in Prithvi Shaw as a replacement for Ruturaj Gaikwad. The CSK skipper is ruled out of IPL 2025 due to injury.

Hair dryer award in PSL: James Vince shares cheeky Insta postPSL 2025: James Vince shared a cheeky post on social media after he got a hair dryer as an award following his heroic century for the Karachi Kings against Multan Sultans at the National Stadium.

NBA: Jonathan Kuminga's bench role sparks concern as Warriors drop crucial game to ClippersThe Golden State Warriors forward Jonathan Kuminga was a healthy scratch on Sunday, April 13, regular NBA game 124–119 overtime loss to the Los Angeles Clippers, a decision that puzzled fans as the team slipped into the Play-In Tournament.

Giving Rohit credit for MI win, not Hardik would be wrong: ManjrekarSanjay Manjrekar feels that giving Rohit Sharma credit for the MI's win over DC and not Hardik Pandya would be a wrong thing. MI secured their second win of the season in Delhi.

Sami Zayn ruled out of WrestleMania 41 following injury; WWE adjusts plansWWE has officially confirmed that Sami Zayn will miss WrestleMania 41 following an injury sustained during an unsanctioned match at Elimination Chamber 2025.

How 18-year-old Mehreen became youngest to conquer winter Spiti18-year-old Mehreen Dhillon has etched her name in the Indian Book of Records for being the youngest to   complete the winter Spiti circuit behind the wheel. Here's the story of Mehreen and her incredible experience through the treacherous snow-laden terrain, in one of the most difficult roads in the world.

Who is Ayush Mhatre? CSK set to sign 17-year-old who idolises Rohit SharmaIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings are all set to confirm the signing of 17-year-old Mumbai opener, Ayush Mhatre as a replacement for Ruturaj Gaikwad. Ayush idolises Rohit Sharma and has several strokes in his arsenal that mirror his cricketing hero.

Video: Fire at Hyderabad hotel where Sunrisers Hyderabad team was stayingA fire broke out at the Park Hyatt in Banjara Hills, just as Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) players were leaving the hotel premises. The blaze was swiftly extinguished, and no casualties were reported.

Mayank Yadav recovers from injury, set to join LSG after long layoffMayank Yadav, one of the fastest bowlers in the history of Indian cricket, has recovered from injury and is set to join the Lucknow Super Giants on Tuesday, April 15, India Today has learnt.

Make Rohit captain: Fan pleads with folded hands to Nita Ambani at Shirdi templeIPL 2025: A fan was seen requesting Mumbai Indians owner Nita Ambani to reinstate Rohit Sharma as captain during the latter's visit to Shirdi temple. Hardik Pandya replaced Rohit as MI captain in 2024.

Who is Ayush Mhatre? CSK set to sign 17-year-old who idolises Rohit SharmaIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings are all set to confirm the signing of 17-year-old Mumbai opener, Ayush Mhatre as a replacement for Ruturaj Gaikwad. Ayush idolises Rohit Sharma and has several strokes in his arsenal that mirror his cricketing hero.

Video: Fire at Hyderabad hotel where Sunrisers Hyderabad team was stayingA fire broke out at the Park Hyatt in Banjara Hills, just as Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) players were leaving the hotel premises. The blaze was swiftly extinguished, and no casualties were reported.

Mayank Yadav recovers from injury, set to join LSG after long layoffMayank Yadav, one of the fastest bowlers in the history of Indian cricket, has recovered from injury and is set to join the Lucknow Super Giants on Tuesday, April 15, India Today has learnt.

Make Rohit captain: Fan pleads with folded hands to Nita Ambani at Shirdi templeIPL 2025: A fan was seen requesting Mumbai Indians owner Nita Ambani to reinstate Rohit Sharma as captain during the latter's visit to Shirdi temple. Hardik Pandya replaced Rohit as MI captain in 2024.

Watch: Kylian Mbappe's red-card tackle on Alaves playerReal Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe was given a straight red card for his horror tackle against Alaves midfielder Antonio Blanco. After the match, assistant coach Davide Ancelotti defended Mbappe, stating that he was not a violent guy.

Subbed off, yet Rohit Sharma orchestrates game-changing moments in thrillerIPL 2025, DC vs MI: Despite having been subbed after the powerplay, Rohit Sharma's inputs from the dugout proved game-changing for Mumbai Indians. Despite Karun Nair's blazing 89, MI successfully defended 205 in Delhi on Sunday.

Man United's worries pile up as Onana replacement fails on debutManchester United fell to a 1-4 loss against Newcastle United on Sunday. Premier League debutant Altay Bayindir did not put in a good show complicating things for coach Ruben Amorim.

Dhoni vs Rishabh in focus as CSK look to arrest freefall vs LucknowIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK match preview: Chennai Super Kings are in a freefall, losing six games in a row this season. Can they arrest their collapse against Rishabh Pant's Lucknow, who have sizzled with their in-form players?

Axar Patel fined Rs 12 lakh, 6th captain penalised for slow over-rateIPL 2025: Axar Patel became the sixth captain to be fined Rs 12 lakh for over-rate offence. The Delhi Capitals suffered their first defeat of the season, falling short of a 206-run target by 13 runs in New Delhi on Sunday.

Watch: Virat Kohli gets pranked by RCB teammates after win vs RRRoyal Challengers Bengaluru players pulled off a hilarious prank on Virat Kohli after their win against  Rajasthan Royals. Tim David stole Virat's bat, which saw hilarious reactions from the legendary batter.

About time RCB started winning at home: Padikkal jokes after 4th away winRoyal Challengers Bengaluru beat Rajasthan Royals 9 wickets in Jaipur on Sunday. This was RCB's 4th away win in the IPL in as many games. After the match, batter Devdutt Padikkal joked that it was about time RCB started to win at home.

RCB not worried about their poor home form in IPL 2025: Mo BobatRoyal Challengers Bengaluru's director of cricket, Mo Bobat, said that he was not worried about the team's home vs away record in the IPL 2025. This season, RCB have done well while visiting other venues, but have floundered at home.

I had the confidence: Karun Nair after making sizzling IPL comebackKarun Nair put in an incredible show with the bat in his comeback to the Indian Premier League. Nair was the lone warrior for Delhi Capitals but was not able to take them home. Speaking after the match, Karun Nair said that he had the confidence that he would do well if given a chance this season.

Karn Sharma relishes MI return after match-winning performance vs DCIPL 2025: Mumbai Indians spinner Karna Sharma said that he was relishing his return to the Mumbai Indians. Sharma returned to the MI side and picked up 3 wickets in his very first match of the tournament vs Delhi Capitals.

Karn trumps Karun: Spinner points out game-changing moment in DC vs MIMumbai Indians' Karn Sharma ruined Karun Nair's IPL comeback on Sunday, April 13. Karn picked up 3 wickets in a nervy game which handed Mumbai their second win of the season.

Karun Nair logs back into IPL, seamlessly syncs with new-age T20 gameIPL 2025, DC vs MI: After waiting for three long years, Karun Nair grabbed the opportunity with both hands after scoring 89 runs off 40 balls for the Delhi Capitals against Mumbai Indians in Sunday's clash at the Arun Jaitley Stadium.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
